website_summaries.verdict: This is one of the best choices for homes with pets because its powerful suction easily picks up the hair and it comes with a special tool for upholstery.
pros: No need to wash or replace filters
Just push a button to release the dirt from the dust cup
Excellent at picking up pet hair
Traps dust without sending any of it back into the air
cons: This vacuum has a small dirt cup, so you may have to empty it more than once if you're vacuuming a large home

customer_reviews.title: It pulls out pet hair deep in carpet.
customer_reviews.text: I read a bunch of 1 star reviews - some people complain about nonsense. This is 10x better than my older pet version DC39. It pulled a ton of pet hair the other missed. It's super quiet. Use a skewer to remove the trash from the container. I did have to empty the container about 5x for my 1000 sq ft basement, but hey, the other Dyson only was emptied once when I vacuumed, so this one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: The worse vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: The worse vacuum ever, we been using Dyson for over 14 years and we have no issues with any of the products until now. We purchase this vacuum in November 2015, we have a small area so we don't used very often but I found my self continuing using our old vacuum instead of this one because after using this one it didn't field that it did a good job. I just got a new dyson animal upright and decided to test the canister vacuum one more time, the result just confirmed that doesn't clean at all
customer_reviews.author: M Cook

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for pets.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum! I have two dogs and two bunnies THAT SHED A TON. And this works great for the carpets and the tile floor. Also it works great for vacuuming the cushions and comforters for our mattresses of dog fur. Really love how easy this is to move around. And did I mention the attachments????? FANTASTIC. I will note, when I recieved this, I did not get the main carpet attachment, I was a bit freaked out at first but I emailed the seller and they got me sorted out really fast :).
customer_reviews.author: Katrina's Christmas wishlist

customer_reviews.title: don't buy - not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: just after 3 weeks of using filter started to detach - very bad design. called dyson and they do not have this part and can not tell me when they will get it. horrible customer service. don't have original packaging any more otherwise would send back in a heartbeat. definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GoForFun

customer_reviews.title: I am so frustrated - I bought this on line ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so frustrated - I bought this on line you can see the date of purchase - spent a lot of money for the Dotson name and it no longer works - the roller brush stopped working - it hasn't been 2 years and I can't believe this happened. I know it's beyond the 30 day return, but do I have any other re-course?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massive hose air leaks and Carpet attachment is run on Air!  a
customer_reviews.text: We are 10+ year Dyson, always have bought canisters due to portability and ease on the shoulders. That being said this design is horrible. After just over a year the hose/handle and the extension device developed a massive air leak to the extent that the carpet attachment no longer works. We are told that because we bought it through AMAZON and no Dyson they are not will to fix their design flaw. Still works great on our hard wood floors but is useless in about half the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The suction is great, but I can't help but feel like power ...
customer_reviews.text: Updated 3/24/16: As feared the "powered brush" is not up to the task of plush carpet. Our brush stopped spinning completely. I took the attachment apart, cleaned it out and still doesn't work... less than 1 year old. Loved my old dyson, will not be buying another. The suction is great, but I can't help but feel like power is missing from the brush head. We previously had a Dyson DC17 animal that finally just broke down after ~10 years. The suction is much improved but I feel the powered brush on the old upright did a better job of combing the carpet and dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A larger canister would make it perfect but the size is very handy and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit of getting used to from using an upright but learning to appreciate the ability to vacuum under furniture without moving it. We have 4 inside dogs; 2 outside dogs; cats; horses and lots of mud and dirt! So it gets a work out on our new porcelain floors. A larger canister would make it perfect but the size is very handy and easy to move about- just count on emptying frequently (or maybe we are just an exceptionally "fuzzy family"!)
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Good prompt service
customer_reviews.text: Good prompt service. Having had the upright animal, I needed to go back to a canister with ease of maneuverability, due to a smaller home. PLUS: Good powerful suction and easy cleaning. The tools are great- I like the turbine head and the improved combination tool (better bristle arrangement). MINUS: Being a smaller canister, I empty frequently- though probably more than I need to! However, no problems releasing the canister as it has a neat release button. Canister best hosed/ washed out to maintain optimum suction.
customer_reviews.author: Fading Actress

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Dyson Animal. I love the first one so much, I bought another! The old one will stay upstairs. Since we just got new carpeting throughout the house, I wanted a new GOOD vacuum. My family also owns 4 cats. Cat hair problem? Solved!! I've owned almost every brand of vacuum on the market, Nothing compares to my Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M  Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it can't vacuum pet hair....
customer_reviews.text: Very good on carpet and hardwood floors, but does a very poor job at picking up pet hair on sofas, blankets, and pet beds. In fact, it barely picks up any pet hair. The extra attachment designed for pet hair is useless. Our old Miele and Kenmoore vacuums do a great job at picking up any pet hair, so we still have to use those for the pet hair vacuuming. It's a pity because otherwise this Dyson canister works great and we love its design, size, and lightweight. Very comfortable to handle. Dyson should improve it so it actually vacuums pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Loramar

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dyson product and the Dyson customer service is amazing, but this seller sent me a product missing a hose and a handle that Dyson had to send to me. Three weeks after purchasing this product was the first time I was able to use the item. I had to wait for Dyson to send me the replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Midgley

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistant suction
customer_reviews.text: doesn't always pick up the dirt, it misses some things..then when you do a throw rug it tries to eat the thing into the tube
customer_reviews.author: Lorri A. Sword

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice Vacuum has good pick up
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice Vacuum has good pick up, but the container is not very big. I have a problem cleaning it after i emptied the container. but otherwise I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Uta Nehr

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice to clean with
customer_reviews.text: This dyson vacuum cleaner is surprisingly very pleasant to use. It is very nice to clean with. I felt both my carpets and floors were spotless after using this. My carpets looked amazing. I was skeptical because of the air driven carbine brushroll being to delicate on carpets but whatever James Dyson is doing is great because my carpets never looked better. Thankyou John and Gena
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how we lived without this vacuum. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for hardwood floors & getting under furniture. Ridiculously poor performance on carpet. Emptying the cannister is ackward. Poor design. I returned this and purchased the upright which is a delight to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Klos

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing with high power of vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife, however he could not get her visa and I need to sell it and move to Canada after around two years studying in the U.S. I have only used this item twice. It was amazing with high power of vacuum. It is not heavy and easy to move.I bought it 300 $, however I want to sell it 240 $.
customer_reviews.author: Benhour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It removes pet hair from the couch better than any other product I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love our vacuum. This is our second Dyson and I wouldn’t have any other vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain, bagless, super lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one vacuum and loved it so much I recommended it to two others and they love this as well. Lightweight, easy too handle.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA C.

customer_reviews.title: couldn't give 5 stars because it's difficult to get all of the dirt/ cat hair to fall out of canister when emptying and the atta
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power, long cord with a strong cord retractor. It's just about exactly what we were looking for...couldn't give 5 stars because it's difficult to get all of the dirt/ cat hair to fall out of canister when emptying and the attachments that come with it are not too good. Would surely love a better brush attachment!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P Williams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a large dog that sheds a lot and the canister holds very little.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this Dyson!! Really easy to use, easy to clean, and works amazing. Dyson warranties can't be beat. I will never own a different brand ever again. The price on Amazon was the best around with warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We researched all of the Dyson products and decided on this one! The suction of the vacuum is the best we have ever had! Excellent Quality as expected from Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: adorable, labrador pup and she seems to never quit ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, powerful! I own a very large, adorable, labrador pup and she seems to never quit shedding. I have two other vacuums but they use bags and it would break the bank to keep replacing those bags. This vacuum picks up everything and empties with very little difficulty. So far a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gil V.

customer_reviews.title: a working fool
customer_reviews.text: The suction is impressive, The attachment nearly glues itself to the rug. It is light weight and easy to use. The cons are it still is ugly to empty and the air passage between the canister and the body of the vacuum tends to plug as does the floor cleaning attachment but it is engineered to be easily disassembled to be cleaned (and who should clean the cleaners?)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6month ago and i am having a problems already. It heats up and stops working. I havad to call the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: naila

customer_reviews.title: Since I received this vacuum cleaner I just enjoy the idea of vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: Since I received this vacuum cleaner I just enjoy the idea of vacuuming. Kind of sad I know, but I really enjoy it. It picks up everything, a ton of dust and particles. I feel my home being cleaner and I know it is. It's expensive but worths every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Edelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Best suction we have ever had with a vacuum cleaner. It moves well and is very easy to carry. It also stores well in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: HRJ

customer_reviews.title: great power, retractable power cord
customer_reviews.text: Easier to use on hardwood and low pile carpet. Prefer of the upright Dyson, great power, retractable power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It's not all that it's cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: It's decent at cleaning carpet. It regularly fails to pick items up off of our hardwood floors and since it doesn't come with a hardwood floor attachment it has caused noticeable damage to our flooring from the nano fiber brush head.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A Carriere

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson. The first one I own is the original Dyson and it's still going. This one is even better because it's easier to maneuver and the attachments are very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Golfing Nana

customer_reviews.title: I am so amazed by this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am so amazed by this vacuum. It does a fantastic job on everything. I love how quiet it is. My Chihuahua and my cat do not get scared when I turn it on. The best Vacuum I have ever bought!! Thank you so much!!! Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: I've always liked the idea of a shop vac because living in ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had 6 back surgeries in last few years and it had gotten tough pushing my kirby around. I've always liked the idea of a shop vac because living in the country, my ceiling needs vacuumed often so this is perfect. Light weight and lots of power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The plastic pieces make it feel cheap for something so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Goody

customer_reviews.title: ... old Dyson was 11 years old and still running fine. This model is a lot easier to operate ...
customer_reviews.text: The old Dyson was 11 years old and still running fine. This model is a lot easier to operate and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Rex H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I really like an upright vacuum better but from the advice I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like an upright vacuum better but from the advice I received it was told to me that this vacuum was better. I do like it I just hate bending over all the time to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Reta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. We forgot that we ever had anything else. Dyson rulezz!!!
customer_reviews.author: Massimo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, had less than 90 days and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed , had less than 90 days and it has lost all suction. Will never own another Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum. Never been happier
customer_reviews.text: Amazing vacuum. Never been happier. So light and maneuverable. Tools are easy to change out and the hose is long enough on this one. Very, very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Hyne

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum is very good when I use it to clean my house
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is very good when I use it to clean my house. But the temperature of ejection air flow is higher than other vacuume.
customer_reviews.author: ricky kuo

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It's nothing but a big plastic piece of junk. My 6yr old Eureka does a better job. I hate that I wasted so much money on this horrible vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is good item for us. but it must have free volt performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Good vacuum....however - It's baloney that they don't include a floor tool and you need to buy it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Toppi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does a very good job with Schipperke puppy fur and all else!
customer_reviews.author: BH Dude

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the purchase of the Dyson Cinetic Big Ball ...
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the purchase of the Dyson Cinetic Big Ball Animal Canister Vacuum, it has the best suction of any other advertised. We have 2 long hair cats and Oriental Rugs. The Oriental Rugs have never been so clean. The wood floors are a snap to clean up after the busy cats. We would recommend this Vacuum to any one.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is CRAZY strong and full of clever details ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is CRAZY strong and full of clever details. My only gripe is that the canister fills up quickly, and emptying it is kinda clumsy. I think they fixed that with the new new new version though.
customer_reviews.author: Pete C.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a place to store it
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I might have is that it's not easy to store, simply because it's not an upright. However, other than that it is a fantastic vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Caoimhin Breidenbach

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient! As we have a high pile carpet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient! As we have a high pile carpet sometimes it is hard to vacuum. I t becomes somewhat hard to pull
customer_reviews.author: C Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Two BIG Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Dyson Cinetic for Animals... with three cats our old vacuum just couldn't pick up the hair. The Dyson makes the cleaning easy and kind of fun. It's rewarding to see the dirt and hair get picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hensley

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAPLY MADE NOT STURDY I CAN SEE MY KID OR HUSBAND EASLIY BREAKING ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY CHEAPLY MADE NOT STURDY I CAN SEE MY KID OR HUSBAND EASLIY BREAKING IT. MY 30 YEAR OLD PANASONIC HAS MORE SUCTION POWER. DISSAPOINTED NEVER BUY DYSON AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: JOANNA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, bit spendy side but powerful and easy to use. Loses a star for high price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K. Smyj

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing new quality.
customer_reviews.text: No longer the quality it ones was. Failed after 2 days, cheaper plastic parts, noisy motor. I hope this was a Monday morning product, otherwise Dyson has become seriously overpriced. Last model lasted 10 years, survived 2 renovations. The current model has no filter, which does not allow you to sucks fine dust like ashes,plaster, etc. Buy another brand if you need it for renovations. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LSL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used once, and it picked up a coin -- then would not work again! Terrible. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product.period. so don't even bother reading more reviews, move on!
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is an opinion of my fife. It's a best of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in May of this year, replacing the power head in August. Didn't even last 6 months. I bought this vac because you can clean over throw rugs without changing heads. I have lots of animals, so this sounded great. And it did work for a couple of months. However the roller brush stripped out of the toothed plastic (really Dyson? Plastic?) gear. Not covered under warranty, 180 bucks for a new one that will probably last another 4 months. I've used it too much to return it and yet its too new to throw away, so here I am ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one is fantastic, no filters to worry about washing and replacing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a ~8 year old DC41 (I think) Animal Canister vacuum. I have cats and rabbits so all the fur and hay would clog up the older model. This one is fantastic, no filters to worry about washing and replacing, and the suction is much stronger so it doesn't get clogged as much. Very easy to take apart and clear when it does get stuck. The ball makes it very easy to maneuver as well. This is easily a vast improvement over my older model. Absolutely LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SciFi Fan

customer_reviews.title: ... for the money and all the hype about how superior Dyson was to all the other vacuums
customer_reviews.text: I expected so much more for the money and all the hype about how superior Dyson was to all the other vacuums. It broke after a few weeks. The vacuum head would not suck up at all, then a belt broke. I was so disgusted I put it I the garage so I wouldn't have to look at it. I finally decided to take it in to be repaired at the assistance of the " BOSS " lol. Really wish I would have spent half the money on a Shark !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Al R.

customer_reviews.title: good but still needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: I need a vacuum that fits into narrow places and still has good suction. This vacuum is much better than the old one it replaced (cheaper brand). It still has difficulty being effective when I vacuum around and under furniture; a more narrow head with the same capabilities as the normal head would help. It would also be great if the pole could be shortened even more to fit into tight spaces then expanded while I was using it. This would be great for getting under my dresser then expand so that it reaches all the way to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: GJS

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner, but.....I've only had it for less than a year and one of the side pieces (hub cap?) has broken off. It is made out of hard plastic and the thing has completely snapped off. I can't figure out what it is for in the first place other than aesthetics. The vacuum still works, but why make these things out of plastic? Ok, maybe to cut down on weight? Bottom line is that I shouldn't have a broken vacuum cleaner after less than one year.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Worthy successor to DC23
customer_reviews.text: It works well. My old Dyson DC23 main motor died suddenly and I needed a replacement fast.The Turbinehead tool works well. I love the "animal" tool for furniture and tight floor spots. I'm not so crazy about the new combination brush & detail tool. But all my old tools fit this one, so I continue to use them. A couple of little irritants: 1) the hose twists and does not un-twist as easily as the DC23. 2) the canister capacity is smaller than the DC23.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Clauson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly functioning vacuum. I have had three other Dyson Vacuums and it is by far the worst. The earlier version worked better and was much more user friendly in terms of use - attachment caddy, clogging, emptying, frequency of emptying. It is so ineffectual as to be almost useless. I am very disappointed and do not recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: A.B. Cee

customer_reviews.title: Great for animal fur
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 animals, this cleans up fur very well. Not too heavy. My dog likes the vacuum attachment that I use to brush him. Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Get upright.
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use this barely picks up dog hair let alone crumbs from dog treats in your rugs, etc. Emptying the canister is inconvenient. Would like to exchange it for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a DYSON!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my second son who has an indoor collie. He said it picked up 5 canisters full of dirt and hair the first time he used it in his tiny two bedroom apartment! I bought my first son and his wife one last year. Now all of us have this vacuum, and we all love it! When I finally got mine several years ago, I felt as if I had finally arrived!!! It was like getting the Rolls Royce of vacuums!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: It's a heavy machine and you are constantly dumping the canister. It is also very awkward to dump as it is difficult to get it aligned with a large kitchen garbage can so that dust etc. doesn't end up back on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: This is a christmas gift. It is still in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a christmas gift. It is still in the box. It hasn't been used yet. I found it at a store and tried it out. It was marvelous. I highly recomend it if you have cats.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Delk

customer_reviews.title: Good Brand for cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: just buy it and just use it. Easy cleaning , easy maintenance of machine. having High and impressive performance which is not like others.
customer_reviews.author: M.GULLU

customer_reviews.title: Not for carpets
customer_reviews.text: Noy for rugs and carpets: brush spin with really low speed and takes so much power even on thin carpet... I thought it is electric motor inside brush but this model is air powered...
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum works great, but like others have said
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works great, but like others have said, it can be tough to empty the dust bin. I usually take it outside to empty over the trashcan (yes, even with the push release).
customer_reviews.author: BamBam

customer_reviews.title: Get a Miele
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had to return it as it did not work on the carpet. Our cleaning lady was worried that she would have to somehow make it work and I caught her using our old Miele. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Natascha Thomson

customer_reviews.title: does not pick up good on rug
customer_reviews.text: does not pick up good on rug. canister is not easy to empty dirt and paper gets stuck and u have to use a straw to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Harris

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant on dog hair
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs who shed like crazy. This vacuum is fantastic at picking up dog hair. It is a lot better than other vacuums we have tried and although it's fairly expensive, it's worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Black

customer_reviews.title: It gets very dirty inside.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum picks up dust/dirt/dog hair that other vacuums didnt even know was there. Solid performer. Lightweight, maneuverable, and suction second to none. The only minor complaint i have is that it can be a bit of a chore to clean the canister and the little nozzles of debris. I use a toothbrush and compressed cans of air. It gets very dirty inside.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with performance
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very happy with this vacuum and believe that I made the right choice for my needs. I really like the suction power and for the most part the design. I believe it would benefit from having slightly larger wheels and it's kind of a pain that there is no on board storage for the upholstery tool.
customer_reviews.author: Nina O. Derrick

customer_reviews.title: It works great! I'm a little nervous that it feels lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I'm a little nervous that it feels lightweight, and won't hold up for the long-haul My previous Dyson upright has been a work horse for about 8 years, and this one feels cheaply made. Not what I expected for the price. Hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really works well, just keep your eye on the dirt collector and empty it carefully. Yes, it is a bit expensive, but WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: Red Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Picks up fine dust that other vacuums simply pass over
customer_reviews.text: Picks up fine dust that other vacuums simply pass over. Lightweight and very easy/convenient to use and move from area to area.
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: Low price/performance ratio! Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Kenmore canister one thinking it would have better suction, etc. But it does not pick up things as well as my old one. The suction power is not as good as it is "famous" for. Not sure why they call it "big ball", but it surely can fall side-ways easily when I drag it to vacuum my carpet. Another bad thing about it is that the "max (full)" dirt line is very low, meaning the red line is at about the third or quarter capacity line, which makes me have to empty this thing very often. Given the price, it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NY

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum. Really sucks dirt from carpet. Only complaint is the head is narrow and you have to vacuum in more strokes.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S. Kling

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to pull around and awkward to maneuver with hose in front of you. Ok if you get a good deal but not worth $499.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great suction and ease of use. Wish the cord was a few feet longer. Its long enough but I am lazy and am over wishing on finding a vacuum where i only have to plug in one time to do the whole down stairs. Thumbs UP!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great and it really picks dirt and dust
customer_reviews.text: Suction is great and it really picks dirt and dust. What I don't like is the size of the canister, it is small and compact which is great but when you have pets with long hair you have to empty it multiple times during your house cleaning. It takes a little bit of time to get used to emptying the canister without covering yourself with some of the dirt and dust but once you get the hang of it, its great! Apart from that I love it, it is easy to use, lightweight and cleans everything from the ceiling down.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Botker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog hair pick-up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog hair pick-up. Not to mention how well it picks up dirt/dust. Cannot say anything bad about this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: David Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WE love this vacuum - I am amazed at home much pet hair and dirt it picks up.
customer_reviews.author: Telschow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Delighted with choice changing from upright. Super great for hardwood floors and four pets.
customer_reviews.author: Exploring

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Poorly engineered, the canister only hold about 1 1/2 cups of dirt & hair. The canister is very hard to remove the dirt and hair from. It does an excellent job picking up dirt & dog hair, the problem is size of the area for dirt and the emptying of the canister
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Shufelt

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot!! really digging our new Dyson - does a great job on our hard wood floors - great suction - I do wish I could make the handle stand on it's own though.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new vacuum! It is great on hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Patty A. Zatezalo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Vac - easy to use and clean~! Good attachments too.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job!! We have cats and dogs, pet hair isn't a problem for us!!
customer_reviews.author: steffs opinion

customer_reviews.title: So far a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The cinetic turbine head is supposed to work on every floor, but it is not. Instead, on hard wood floor it is blowing the dirt around and it takes 10x more time to clean hard wood flow than with my Riccar1300 and the motor brush. Check this video if the link comes across:  It is easy to handle and works ok on carpet stairs. But since the turbines and nozzles are not powered and since their underside is flat, they do not have channels to clean corners effectively. So far I am not impressed with this device at all and the reputation is way ahead of the real performance.
customer_reviews.author: JoeColorado

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Getting the canister out when it needs dumped is easy once you realize the red button is not the button that gets the canister to disconnect from the vacuum. This took me about 15 mins of googling
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Canister vacuum improved
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Dyson and the best one so far!! Many improvements have implemented making this model a breeze to use. Thank you Dyson and Amazon for an incredible delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Schmicking

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not all its cracked up to be. Overpriced and undersized.
customer_reviews.author: Stavros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, would buy again, no filters. just empty. steers easily. light but mighty, have pets in house.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD THIS FOR AWHILE NOW AND HAVE NO COMPLAINTS.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Jon Boy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great - really picks up both carpet and hard wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Toddes

product_meta.title: Dyson Cinetic Animal Canister Vacuum
product_meta.description: The Dyson Cinetic Animal vacuum contains 54 ultra-efficient Dyson Cinetic tips which oscillate up to 5,000 times per second to separate the microscopic particles that clog other vacuums. Because of their efficiency, there's no filter that needs washing or replacing meaning there is no loss of suction.
feature_bullets: No dirty filters to wash or replace
Dyson Cinetic science captures the dust that clogs other vacuums’ filters
Advanced cleaner head removes fine dust from hard floors
The only turbine head controlled at the handle. Certified asthma and allergy friendly by the Asthma and Allergy Foundation of America
Hygienic bin emptying. Just push the button to release the dirt

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars259 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
